name: DocumentationReflector
short_description: Documentation Reflector is a simple way to make effective use of the C# XML documentation tags in your .NET assemblies. The output of Documentation Reflector is a usable XML file with enough information to generate MSDN-style documentation.
summary: Tool to generate useful .NET assembly documentation
